content.en: Optimizing Satellite Networks: Researchers have been exploring various algorithms to optimize power allocation and resource allocation in satellite-terrestrial networks. These algorithms, such as power allocation algorithms, beamforming schemes, and user selection schemes, aim to improve the quality of service and maximize system capacity. Additionally, algorithms like joint optimization iterative algorithms and rate-splitting multiple access schemes are being developed to enhance communication capacity and user fairness in these networks.
content.da: Optimering af satellitnetværk: Forskere har undersøgt forskellige algoritmer for at optimere strømfordeling og ressourceallokering i satellit-terrestriske netværk. Disse algoritmer, såsom strømfordelingsalgoritmer, beamforming-skemaer og brugervalgs-skemaer, har til formål at forbedre kvaliteten af tjenesten og maksimere systemkapaciteten. Derudover udvikles algoritmer som fælles optimering iterative algoritmer og rate-splitting multiple access skemaer for at øge kommunikationskapaciteten og brugertilfredsheden i disse netværk.
